label.value: This armour, studded with beryls, known also as Elf-stones, is a fine set, crafted by the Elves for a minstrel of great renown.
Swift Bow recovery time reduced by 2 seconds
Penetrating Shot recovery time reduced by 1 second
This fine armour was crafted from aurochs hides taken from the great aurochs of the North Downs in tribute to the mighty hunters who acquired the hides.
Crafted by dwarf-masters of finely-tooled leather and hardened steel from the depths of the great mines beneath Ered Luin.
+20% to Surprise Strike damage while behind target and in Stealth
This armour was cobbled together by a famous burglar, who sought renown in more than just the burgling arts.
Crafted by Elf-masters to reflect the timlessness, strength, and brilliance of the great star clusters above.
Defeat Event skills recovery time reduced by 15%
Escape from Darkness recovery time reduced by 5 minutes
Every captain is known at a glance by his armour, and this set is perhaps one of the most recognizable you have seen. It seems Arnorian in origin.
Crafted of the highest quality leather, worked to great strength by the mysterious Rangers of the North.
Chance to resist your Challenge is reduced by 5%
Challenge The Darkness recovery time reduced by 25%
This armour was forged for a warrior of the Grey Mountains before the Dragons came. Whoever wore this would be proud to know that a brave heart such as yourself has found it.
Ancient armour of legendary dwarf-make, said to have been kept in the dragon-hoard of Nargothrond in ages past.
Reduces the Power cost of all AOE skills by 5%
Chance to Block or Parry your Bracing Attack is reduced
This armour was forged from the scales of Scatha the Worm, who was slain long ago by the great North-man Fram.
Gleaming armour of Elf-make, forged long ago in the lands of the mighty river flowing from darkest Fangorn.
Finely-tooled armour crafted long ago by the proud Horse-lords of Rohan.
Glorious armour of dwarf-make, finely-crafted in the name of the legendary dwarf-lords of ages long past.
Armour of ancient Elf-make, forged in the dark forests beneath the distant Mountain of Pine.
Forged long ago by master-craftsmen of Arnor, finely crafted armour of the great strength and deadly beauty of the ancient dragons of legend.
Test of Will recovery time reduced by 15 seconds
Chance to resist your Blinding Flash is reduced by 5%
This fine armour represents the ancient wisdom of the Elves and pieces of it portray their departure into the West.
Panthavron was a wealthy noble of Evendim, best known for throwing elaborate parties.
Renowned defenders of the tombs of Annúminas receive such gifts.
The Council grants such prizes to their wisest tacticians.
Potent healers in Rivendell can expect potent rewards.
Powerful warriors in Rivendell can expect powerful rewards.
Chance to Block or Evade your ranged attacks are reduced by 2%
The Council grants such prizes to their greatest scouts.
The destiny of the Rangers can almost be felt.
This armour was granted as a reward for defending Eriador from the terror of Nûrz Gâshu.
This armour was granted as a reward for defending Eriador from the terror of Nûrz Gâshu.
This armour was granted as a reward for defending Eriador from the terror of Nûrz Gâshu.
This armour was granted as a reward for defending Eriador from the terror of Nûrz Gâshu.
This armour was granted as a reward for defending Eriador from the terror of Nûrz Gâshu.
This armour was granted as a reward for defending Eriador from the terror of Nûrz Gâshu.
This armour was granted as a reward for defending Eriador from the terror of Nûrz Gâshu.
